channel.title: Oliver Laxe on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Oliver Laxe on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Oscars: Spain Picks Oliver Laxe’s Trippy ‘Sirat’ as Best International Feature Submission
item.description: A father and son join a group of itinerant ravers in the deserts of Morocco in Laxe’s techno-tracked drama about the end of the world.
